LWC-CmdGrp.name: Util
LWC-CmdGrp.introduce: This group contains a number of tools to help you complete a number of other features.

LWC-CmdItm.name: sleep
LWC-CmdItm.introduce: After using this function, the command queue in the console will be dormant for a period of time.

LWC-CmdItm.name: getUnixTimeStamp
LWC-CmdItm.introduce: Get current system Unix time stamp, accurate to milliseconds.
LWC-CmdItm.return: unixTimeStamp:integer|Current system Unix time stamp, accurate to milliseconds.

LWC-CmdItm.name: randomUUID
LWC-CmdItm.introduce: Through JavaScript create a UUID and return it.

LWC-CmdGrp.name: DataCollection
LWC-CmdGrp.introduce: The function in this group can help you collect the specified data into the data collection pool.
